thread.title: Trump Administration Seeks to Stimulate Private Space Projects

author: Andy Pasztor
title: Trump Administration Seeks to Stimulate Private Space Projects

organizations.name: spacex launches falcon heavy rocket spacex

text:
Vice President Mike Pence on Wednesday is expected to announce new moves promoting private ventures in space, including easing launch rules and putting the Commerce Department in charge of broader deregulation initiatives.
The recommendations, which are awaiting President Donald Trumpâ€™s final approval, are intended to better coordinate federal efforts to spur commercial space projects, according to government and industry officials familiar with the details. With the primary goal of rolling back regulatory burdens on the budding...
